channel.title: Need help with making new weapons from scratch
channel.description: ok i downloaded and took out the weapons model but idk how to put them in all i want is for them to be inside the game doesnt matter if it has a attack script part or what not i just want to put it in side my server so i can have a godsword etc. i also want to know is the servers scripted in java script or java or C++?
